news.title: 末日钟逼近！世界怎么了？
特朗普警告伊朗“时间不多了” 美军在波斯湾集结
news.title0: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
news.content: 特朗普警告伊朗，随着美军在波斯湾持续集结，就核计划达成协议的“时间不多了”。伊朗外长回应称其军队已“手指扣在扳机上”。
news.content0: Donald Trump has warned Iran that "time is running out" to negotiate a deal on its nuclear programme following the steady build-up of US military forces in the Gulf.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 星巴克取消CEO私人飞机使用上限
news.title0: Starbucks scraps $250,000 cap on boss's use of company jet
news.content: 星巴克因安全考虑，取消了首席执行官每年25万美元的私人飞机使用上限。该CEO需从加州家中飞往西雅图总部。
news.content0: Starbucks has scrapped a $250,000 (£181,000) cap on its chief executive's use of the coffee chain's company jet for personal travel because of concerns about his safety.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 厄瓜多尔谴责美移民局特工试图闯入其领事馆
news.title0: Ecuador says ICE agent attempted to enter its Minneapolis consulate
news.content: 厄瓜多尔政府谴责一名美国移民与海关执法局特工试图进入其明尼阿波利斯领事馆，称此举违反《维也纳领事关系公约》。
news.content0: The government of Ecuador has condemned what it described as an attempt by a US federal immigration agent to enter the Ecuadorean consulate in Minneapolis.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美联储维持利率不变 鲍威尔捍卫央行独立性
news.title0: US Fed holds interest rates and defends independence
news.content: 美国联邦储备委员会决定维持利率不变。主席鲍威尔在面临司法调查压力下，强调央行独立性至关重要。
news.content0: The US Federal Reserve has voted to hold interest rates as its chair, Jerome Powell, defended the importance of central bank independence.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 亚马逊确认裁员1.6万人 此前误发邮件
news.title0: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
news.content: 亚马逊确认将裁员1.6万人。此前，公司因误发邮件提前向员工透露了全球裁员计划。
news.content0: US technology giant Amazon has confirmed it will cut 16,000 jobs - hours after it told staff about a new round of global redundancies in an email apparently sent in error.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国三兄弟坠入冰窟身亡 母亲救援未果
news.title0: 'I couldn't save them' - US mum's horror as three sons die falling through pond ice
news.content: 美国得州三名年幼兄弟在私人池塘冰面玩耍时坠入冰窟身亡。其母亲试图救援，但因冰面不断破裂未能成功。
news.content0: Three young brothers have died in Bonham, north Texas, after falling through ice on a private pond on Monday.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 男子因袭击被判有罪 巴伦·特朗普曾报警
news.title0: Man guilty of assault after Barron Trump reported attack to UK police
news.content: 一名俄罗斯男子因袭击罪被判有罪。此前，特朗普之子巴伦通过视频通话目睹袭击后向英国警方报案。
news.content0: A Russian man has been found guilty of assault occasioning actual bodily harm after Donald Trump's son told UK police he had seen a woman being beaten up on a video call.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 末日钟调至距午夜仅85秒 创最接近纪录
news.title0: Doomsday Clock Ticks Closer Than Ever to Apocalypse
news.content: 象征人类濒临毁灭的“末日钟”被调至距离象征末日的“午夜”仅85秒，创下自1947年设立以来最接近纪录。
news.content0: The Doomsday Clock, a metaphorical timepiece meant to depict how close humanity is to destruction, ticked closer than ever to midnight on Tuesday: 85 seconds to the stroke of doom.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 英航客机起飞后轮胎脱落 惊险瞬间被拍下
news.title0: British Airways flight to London loses wheel during take-off
news.content: 英国航空公司一架从拉斯维加斯飞往伦敦的客机起飞后不久，一个轮胎从起落架脱落。惊险瞬间被视频记录。
news.content0: The moment a wheel fell off a British Airways plane shortly after it took off has been captured on video.
news.author: Sky News
